title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
820-3332 is now dead, I get no light on the charger. The board does not increase in temp. I got 20v coming in from my 85w adapter and g3h is active at 3.42v,,. I am fairly new to this so any info given in dummy format would be much appreciated. someone mentioned the USB power rail but I cant seem to pin point. 

Thank you so much in advance.

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
Post exact PPBUS_G3H voltage?
Do you get 3V3_S5/SUS?

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: Now i am getting PPBUS_G3H .721v and dropping.. meaning it drops numbers by the second. on 3v3_S5 i got 0.001v

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
Post diode mode (red probe at ground) at L7030.
Also for L7220/60 and the other coils.
Check for short (or low value) to ground on USB power and data lines.

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: can you guide me to the usb power lines???

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
Diode mode: L7030 0.0424v 
L7220 gives me a beep at 0.018v
L7060 0.129v

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: I am also not getting anything on PP5V_S0

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
"L7030 0.0424v"
Are you sure it is not close to 0.400-0.450 instead???

"L7220 gives me a beep at 0.018v"
That is too low.
I hope you've disconnected power when measured diode mode.
Also allow 10-15s after power is removed.

"usb power lines???"
Post diode mode at pins 2/6 of U4600.

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: Correct me if I am wrong, this means there is a short on pp5v_s4?

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
PP5V_S5: 0.040v 

Doesn?t S5 need to work in order for s4 to turn on?

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
5V_S5 looks bad too.
Few things connected there.
Check again disconnecting trackpad.
Also check for short on 5V_SUS.
When you get 5V_S5, go for 5V_S4.

Don't forget, PPBUS_G3H is first required.

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
PPbus_g3h is: 12v isn?t this supposed to be 12.5? 
i have the board taken out with nothing connected to it.

message:
Do you really get 12.0V?
What about 5V_S5?
SMC_PM_G2_EN present?

message:

5v_s5 is now 0.116v 
smc_pm_g2 is at .455v

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
Check if SMC_RESET_L is good.
I hope you still get 3V42 at least.

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
Smc reset is 2.456v 

keep in mind that my light indicator does not turn on as well

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: Yes 3v42 is good

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
Post all U5010 voltages.
Remove F7040/41 and check L7030 voltage.

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
U5010
pin 1: 3.431v
pin 2: 0.000v
pin 3: 3.431v
pin 4: 2.776v
pin 5: 2.446v
pin 6: 2.421v
pin 7: 3.432v
pin 8: 3.344v

L7030: diode mode 0.420v 
voltage mode plugged in 12.12v

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
You have a problem with SMC_RESET_L; it should be steady 3.3V.
Remove R7000 and check it again.
If still bad, remove (clean at least) J6100.
Be sure R5028 is OK; remove it and test SMC_RESET_R_L,
Ig good, then change SMC.

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: I don?t have a J6000 or R5028

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
J5100, sorry.
Are you sure only R5000 connected to pin 5 of U5010?
Check continuity from there to R7000.
R5028 is 0 ohm resistor, so may not be placed, if trace is OK.

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: There is continuity between r7000 and the few components connected to it.. I am still getting 2.6v on smc reset L... where is that power coming from.. I have a feeling something else is preventing it

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: I removed R5000 and R7000 and I get 1.4v on smc reset

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: Replaced R5000 and U5010 and now I have 3.4 on smc reset on pin 5 and R5000 but when I probe R7000 I still only get 1.6

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
SMC_RESET_L is generated through R5000, from 3V42.
And U5010 controls the delay time required by reset function.

"when I probe R7000 I still only get 1.6"
Do you mean SMC_RESET_L drops to 1.6V when solder R7000?
Change U7000 then.
Which pin of R7000 has 1.6V?

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: Ok so now I get 3.27 without smc on.. with smc on I get 2.8

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: Try other SMC then...

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: Replaced SMC and I now have a green light and computer boots.. thank you for all your help and please mark as solved

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message: Never mind spoke too soon... computer keeps restarting.. I get log in screen sometimes but it goes half way and gets stuck

title: Macbook Pro Retina 820-3332 Instant Death after powered USB plugged in. PLEASE HELP!
message:
Try SMC bypass mode.
Reball the SMC, be sure to have good solders.
